# Desecrate Battlefield (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 12]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, S, M, DF

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** 100-ft.-radius emanation

**Duration:** 1 day/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Heroes of Battle (WotC), pg. 126

This spell imbues a large area with negative energy. This functions as the *[[Desecrate (Spell)|desecrate]]* spell, except as noted here.

*Desecrate battlefield* counters and dispels *[[Consecrate (Spell)|consecrate]]* and *[[Consecrate Battlefield (Spell)|consecrate battlefield]]*.

*Material Components:* A vial of unholy water and 1 pound of platinum dust (500 gp).
